mutants.original_line: return [[sorted(k for k,v in Counter(row[j]).most_common() if v == max(Counter(row[j]).values())) for j in range(len(row))] for row in matrix]
mutants.mutated_line: return [[sorted((k for (k, v) in Counter(row[j]).most_common() if v != max(Counter(row[j]).values()))) for j in range(len(row))] for row in matrix]
